comingSoon.message: Want to bid on Crispy’s shell? Revisit for a link to the auction in the evening on 11 March 2010.

closed.message:
Hey, sorry you missed the bidding, but Crispy's shell
went to lethalgtjoe for $610.

preloader.accessibilityReminder: NEED A MORE ACCESSIBLE WEBSITE – VISIT OUR LITE SITE

prizes.content: There are over 1000 prizes to be won!

howtowin.content:
Simply buy a 'Bare All' pack of M&M'S® (M&M'S® Milk, M&M'S® Peanut or M&M'S® Crispy) and you could be lucky enough to win one of over 1000 instant prizes!

If your pack contains stark naked uncoated chocolate M&M'S®, and names a prize and a winning code inside then, subject to verification, you are an instant winner. To claim your prize register your details on this website before 5PM Sydney time on 28 May 2010.

If you don't have a winning pack, you could still win a prize by entering the Second Chance Draw.

You can enter the draw on this website, or by sending an SMS (TXT) to the phone number 1971 1791 (for entrants in Australia) or 8393 (for entrants in New Zealand), that comprises in the following order with a space between each item:

(a)   the Unique Code printed inside the 'Bare All' pack used to enter;
(b)   your first name;
(c)   your last name; and
(d)   for an entrant in Australia, his/her postcode
            (optional for New Zealand residents).


Aust SMS Cost 55cents inc GST. NZ SMS Cost 20cents inc GST. Service Provider PrimeFocus 1800 818 957

Entry into the Second Chance Draw closes at 5PM Sydney time on 28 May 2010.

winners.altCopy: Winners' names will be posted when the competition is completed.

prizeRedemption.heading: CLAIM YOUR PRIZE
prizeRedemption.message: Complete & submit this form to register your winning pack. Fields marked * are mandatory

field.label: SUBURB
field.error: Please enter your city or suburb

field.label: ENTER YOUR UNIQUE WINNING CODE
field.error: Please enter your unique winning code

prizeRedemption.field: I am 13 years of age, or older, and I accept the Conditions of Entry
I understand that I must keep the pack that bears the unique code that I have entered and, if asked, I must hand it over in order to win a prize.
Yes, I would like to receive details about other Mars Australia or Mars New Zealand brand offers and information (which I understand will be sent to me via Email, SMS or Mail).

secondChance.heading: 2nd CHANCE DRAW
secondChance.message:
If you are not an instant winner, and the M&M'S® in your pack have their shells on,
complete this form to enter the second chance draw. Fields marked * are mandatory

field.label: SUBURB
field.error: Please enter your city or suburb

field.label: ENTER YOUR UNIQUE WINNING CODE
field.error: Please enter your unique winning code

Yes, I would like to receive details about other Mars Australia or Mars New Zealand brand offers and information (which I understand will be sent to me via Email, SMS or Mail).

feedback.subject: MMS BARE ALL : Feedback

major_winner.heading: YOU'RE A WINNER!
major_winner.message:
Congratulations you have won a $20,000 cash prize! Someone will contact you shortly to arrange your award. If you have any questions in the mean time please complete our feedback form.

Your prize ID # :
major_winner.meta:
If you have any questions in the mean time
please complete our feedback form.

minor_winner.heading: YOU'RE A WINNER!
minor_winner.message:
Congratulations you won a 1,000 x $100† Prepaid Gift Cards. We will place this in the mail so you will receive it within 28 working days. If you have any questions in the mean time please complete our feedback form.

Your prize ID # :
minor_winner.meta: If you have any questions in the mean time please complete our feedback form.

second_chance.heading: SECOND CHANCE DRAW
second_chance.message:
You are entered in the second chance draw.

You have now been entered in the second chance draw. Any instant win prizes that have not been won at the end of the Entry Period will be awarded in a second chance draw which will commence at 12 noon on 30 July 2010.

invalid.heading: INVALID CODE
invalid.message: Sorry, the code [code] you entered is invalid or was entered incorrectly. Please check the pack's unique code and try again.

error.heading: WEBSITE ERROR
error.message:
Sorry, the web site has encountered an error please try again soon

Technical information :

closed.heading: SORRY, ENTRIES HAVE CLOSED
closed.message:
The M&M'S® Bare All competition has come to an end and we will no longer be accepting entries. Be sure to check out our Winners page to see the competition results.

See you next time!

share.email: mailto:?subject=M%26M'S%AE Bare All &body=http://www.m-msbareall.com Cover your eyes, it's the... stark-naked M%26M'S%AE. Oh, go on, have a peek

content.disclaimer:
Single prize pool for Australia and New Zealand. Entrants must be aged 13 years, or older. Entry opens 9AM, 11/1/10 and closes 5PM, 28/5/10 (both Sydney time). Entry is subject to     these conditions.
†AU$100 gift card for Australian residents / NZ$100 gift card for New Zealand residents. ‡ A$20,000 for Australian or New Zealand residents.
